description:
New Version 1.7 includes more new images and a random slide show!
Hammz Hotteez™ Babes features a bevy of gorgeous beauties in various sexy bikinis and lingerie purely for your viewing pleasure (80 photos in all). You can choose to browse by the model, viewing a full screen slide show of just her or you can choose a slide show of all of these gorgeous babes at once. You will also be able to set your favorite image as your wallpaper and you can go back to pick a new one as your wallpaper as often as you like. So, download it today and show off these beauties to your buddies. Available in: English, French, German and Spanish.
